content.body: Lachy: congrats on the ALA publication!
gets the same corp.google certificate error as Philip`
has a feeling one of Google's POP servers is busted
Lachy: question about http://www.alistapart.com/articles/previewofhtml5 -- why no link to or mention of http://www.double.co.nz/video_test/ and Mozilla's experimental builds?
man, uris are hard to parse
wow i'm still getting mail from thursday
I wonder how close the latest URI/IRI RFCs are to what it actually takes to parse real-world URLs in web content
i am a bit confused about <button>. should I be using it over input type=submit ?
goes mad at his internet connection. can't push http-parsing tests to the web. stuck on my HD :\
input is simpler, button allows rich content (ooh, aah)
though i guess button isn't well supported by IE. not sure. distant memories
hendry: That's if you use the value
i wonder if i can have bg images in select's option forms
